subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees blew a three-run lead with only four outs to go. But in the 11th inning Aaron Loup, the Toronto relief pitcher, threw a ball down the left-field line, allowing two runs to score.
snippet: The Yankees blew a three-run lead with only four outs to go. But in the 11th inning Aaron Loup, the Toronto relief pitcher, threw a ball down the left-field line, allowing two runs to score.
